documents.document: @carlyematthew thank you.
@carlyematthew brilliant idea, if I may, I would like to copy the idea? Thank you for sharing your finds.
@JoeCCunningham @BelieveInFilm thanks :)
@BelieveInFilm thank you. I'm a dope.
@filmdevelop @kickstarter I backed that too.
@elliottucker d'oh! Of course! Thank you. I shall hide now.
@chichic @OldSchoolLab my pleasure.
@chichic @OldSchoolLab these are fantastic.
@chichic @OldSchoolLab I love your shots.
Sorry for being a bit stupid, but what does the BIF in #bifscale17 stand for? Thank you. #believeinfilm
It just occurred to me that February starts tomorrow and so does #bifscale17. #believeinfilm #emulsive
@Wakefanatic @OldSchoolLab may I ask what dilution you used? Did you agitate the soup at all? Thanks.
@FaultyFlipFlap @JonWilkening @schneidan I use the tetinol kit, it is very good.
@elliottucker I have a friend in Argentina who follows the nazi story there, and their impact on the government. It is fascinating.
@elliottucker All true. It will be intreasting to read.
@elliottucker it will be an interesting read all the same, and it's not mein keimf, which I will never read.
@elliottucker true. Good point. I wish you luck. I love reading, but, I don't think I could read that particular book.
@elliottucker That's an awful lot of hate to read.
@elliottucker wow. That will depress you, even more than the news.
@elliottucker thank you.
@niallcarsonpa @ADWart @PA Thank you! I can't wait to see it.
@elliottucker I will just write to all of them and the tds too.
@niallcarsonpa @ADWart @PA where are these please? Thank you.
@elliottucker mine will only list meps and councillors.
@FlakPhoto what would it involve? Thank you.
@TheVonster thank you for sharing this. It's great.
@elliottucker Does that Bozo think he playing Sims? Annoying the military is not a good idea.
@Reuters it is a Ban (however long) on muslims travelling to America. How is that not a #muslimban ?
@ukigoni Remove Mentions of Jews from the Holocaust??? That is like trying to describe rain without mentioning water (But WAY more serious)
@EMULSIVEfilm I am looking forward to seeing the results of this project, it is an interesting one.
@CtyOfBlackbirds have you seen this? https://t.co/MdItHRmLec
@nbrez @UpliftIRL I have signed it. Thanks for sharing it Bressie.
@victorbezrukov been there, done that, felt like a prat. :-/
@FlakPhoto how would you like us to participate? Thank you.
@MrHolga that is a fantastic name!
@MrHolga He has a great name by the way.
@MrHolga there is a detective joke in their somewhere. :)
@TMAX_party I bought some film today, so I am ready to party! #emulsive #believeinfilm
@hacerfotos @takingphotos @35PHOTO_main they look like they are about to salsa in the snow.
@elliottucker Wow, that sounds very cool.
@ZDP189 Happy new year to you and your family. I like your daughters dress and camera. Have fun.
RIP John Hurt. I used to see him around town, seemed like a great guy. I loved his work.
@filmdevelop knit? Moonwalk? Cartwheel? ....
@markmitchellbro @BelieveInFilm yes, all the time. 😐
I have now found the 110 hacks I need. I see a mess in my future :) #emulsive #believeinfilm
@InteriorDIYer She look is very excited about her ribena ;)
@tedforbes wahoo! I am looking forward to it.
@elliottucker my dev efforts need LOTS of improvement.
@elliottucker I scan at home. I'll need to figure out how to do that for 110 too. If I had important scans I'd give it to Steve Crozier.
@elliottucker cool, you could try red rua, rua red, whatever its called in Tallaght, if you were around that area for whatever reason.
@elliottucker what scanner will you buy? Did you see that mammoth scanner that has been released?
@elliottucker I have been watching that. I think alt-snowflake was great. Maybe next time you could be a rogue snowflake?
@elliottucker by the way, love your new name.
@elliottucker I have done colour before with the tetanol kits, it's easier than b&w. You should try it, you will do brilliantly.
@elliottucker true :) I was going to go in tomorrow anyway, 110 reels are tricky to find.
@elliottucker colour. I have 35/120 reels. Thanks.
Q: I have 4 rolls of 110 that need dev, do I send them off or try 2 hack a way of dev them myself (I don't have 110 reel) Thanks #emulsive
@AnGobanSaor I can spend a long time faffing about with my digital files.
@JoeCCunningham I only forgot about the stop for one roll. Thanks for all. Your help.
@JoeCCunningham ok, that's great. Thank you. I put through three rolls afterwards and they seem ok. I won't m forget about the stop again
@JoeCCunningham ah ok. So, should I get rid of that fix and start again? Thanks.
@AnGobanSaor That is all true. I enjoy it though.
@JoeCCunningham thank you. That's good to know.
@AnGobanSaor yup. Everything seems to be ok though.
Whoops! I forgot to use a stopbath before I fixed. #believeinfilm
@jk_rowling Good Morning. This morning, I can't help but remember Dolores Umbridge in front of a wall of magical decrees.
@FlakPhoto This picture reminds me something.... https://t.co/NEVfKdtQGl
@FilmsnotDead it's a good thing I don't live in London anymore.
@elliottucker I'm not sure. In Trumplandia, I doubt it. It might help other people though.
@elliottucker have you registered as Muslim?
@victorbezrukov seriously!
@victorbezrukov it is easier than b&w development.
@papercamera I love Pinhole and would love to attend one of your events. Thanks.
@papercamera hi guys, will you be running one in Dublin? Or maybe London? Thank you.
@mushypea007 a friend of our family was part of the first syndicate in Ireland to win the Irish Lotto. They blew it all in no time.
@mushypea007 Ah well. The doggos will have to wait for a treat. :)
@fotodudenz That's good. It's still a pain though to deal with people like that.
@mushypea007 oohh, did you win Mush? Are Buddy and Pearl going to have their favourite treats?
@elliottucker @TheVonster congratulations guys! Happy anniversary.
@mushypea007 apparently it is a syndicate that works in a factory.
@fotodudenz oh, ok. I hope your day got better after that.
@jesskellynt I think it's legit, I saw an analysis on YouTube about it. He can be hit or miss.
@JoeCCunningham @Grumpyfck in Switzerland if you order tea, they want to know what is wrong with you, so they can give you the right one.
@JoeCCunningham @Grumpyfck strawberry tea with honey tastes jelly or jello.
@JoeCCunningham @Grumpyfck Barrys Tea is the one to drink in Ireland.
@JoeCCunningham Irish Breakfast tea, is also just tea, unless in a cafe. I'm not sure of differences between English & Irish breakfast teas.
@JoeCCunningham if you are in a cafe and you want a particular tea, you would call it English breakfast tea, as opposed to green tea etc.
@mushypea007 his name is Bernie, that will be enough.
@mushypea007 I like your thinking. Maybe we could adopt him? We could give him a passport.
@mushypea007 Maybe? Though Trump doesn't seem to like science, so maybe not.
@mushypea007 England has Bernies brother. Maybe if there is another brother, we could borrow him?
@sergeysus unfortunately, there are some men who seem to believe that because they have a penis, they decide what is going to happen.
@JonWilkening it really is. Nice work.
@JonWilkening I love this one.
@ukigoni is it just me, or is he genuinely scary? #orangeoverlord #humanityvacum
@elliottucker I am. Thank you, I need to do better.
@papercamera @fslashD I just spotted this now, I wonder will they sell it afterwards. Also, where can I find their sites? Thank you.

@FlakPhoto Nicely put.
